title: Thiel-Backed Crypto Hoarder ETHZilla Sells Tokens to Pay Debt
description: ETHZilla Corp., a cryptocurrency accumulator backed by billionaire Peter Thiel, appears to be shifting focus as investors abandon what was briefly one of the stock market’s hottest trades.
content: ETHZilla Corp., a cryptocurrency accumulator backed by billionaire Peter Thiel, appears to be shifting focus as investors abandon what was briefly one of the stock market’s hottest trades.
